note.p: Education: Trinity College, Cambridge; MA (1713), DD (Com. Reg. 1728)

Career: Ordained deacon and priest (1704); Vicar of Weekley, Northamptonshire (1704-1722); Rector of Warkton (1714-1742); Rector of Scaldwell (1722-1742); Chaplain to the Prince of Wales; Chaplain to the first troop of Guards and to John Montagu, 2nd Duke of Montagu (FRS 1718)
References: Gentleman's Magazine (1742), p163; London Magazine (1742), p153
Notes: Proposed by Dr Champhet (a candidate). Withdrew 1730 (CM 14/01/1741). Venn gives date of death as 21 Jan 1742
